item.title: Live Coding
item.description: I’ve been going to interviews again, and I’d like to share some observations. This time we talk about live coding in enterprise companies and how the recruitment process should be constructed. Live Coding There’s always a lot of noise around him. Some people like it (interviews), some people don’t like it at all (candidates), and someone goes to a psychologist after him for six months. This is not really to understand that the candidate is able to code; there are not enough extensive projects on Github, profile articles with code, reports after all. As I was told, this is done to ensure that everyone is treated equally in recruitment. Well, good luck hiring a leader or a gentleman in five rounds. At the second, he’ll ask himself, “Do I really need this?
